船玉: (ふなだま) - guardian deity of a ship
船留め: (ふなどめ) - preventing a ship from passing or from leaving port
船着き場: (ふなつきば) - harbour; harbor; landing place; wharf; anchorage
船着場: (ふなつきば) - harbour; harbor; landing place; wharf; anchorage
船祭: (ふなまつり) - boat festival; festival with portable shrines carried on boats
船祭り: (ふなまつり) - boat festival; festival with portable shrines carried on boats
船端: (ふなばた) - side of a boat; gunwale
船籍: (せんせき) - ship's nationality; ship's country of registration
船籍港: (せんせきこう) - port of registry
船縁: (ふなべり) - side of a boat; gunwale
船脚: (せんきゃく) - speed of a boat; (ふなあし only) draft/draught
船腹: (ふなばら) - side or bottom of a ship; ship's hold; bottoms; shipping; tonnage; freight space
船舶: (senpaku) - embarcação, navio, transporte marítimo, embarcação marítima
船舶安全法: (せんぱくあんぜんほう) - Ship Safety Law
船舶登録証: (せんぱくとうろくしょう) - ship's certificate; ship's registration
船舶職員: (せんぱくしょくいん) - ship's personnel; ship's officers
船艇: (せんてい) - ship; boat; vessel; craft
船荷証券: (ふなにしょうけん) - bill of lading; BL
船蔵: (ふなぐら) - boathouse; (ふなぐら only) ship's hold/hatch
船虫: (フナムシ) - wharf roach (species of isopod closely related to the sea slater; Ligia exotica)
船蛸: (フネダコ) - winged argonaut (species of paper nautilus, Argonauta hians)
船貝: (フネガイ) - Arca avellana (species of ark shell)
船賃: (ふなちん) - passage; fare; shipping charges
船足: (ふなあし) - speed of a boat; (ふなあし only) draft/draught
船長: (senchou) - capitão do navio, comandante; comprimento de um navio; barqueiro
船霊: (ふなだま) - guardian deity of a ship
船頭多くして船山に上る: (せんどうおおくしてふねやまにのぼる) - too many cooks spoil the broth; too many captains will steer the ship up a mountain
船頭多くして船山に登る: (せんどうおおくしてふねやまにのぼる) - too many cooks spoil the broth; too many captains will steer the ship up a mountain
船食虫: (フナクイムシ) - shipworm (esp. naval shipworm, Teredo navalis); teredo
船饅頭: (ふなまんじゅう) - low-grade prostitute; prostitute working from boats on the Sumida River
船首: (せんしゅ) - bow (of boat); prow; stem
船首像: (せんしゅぞう) - figurehead (on a ship)
船魂: (ふなだま) - guardian deity of a ship
船齢: (せんれい) - age of a vessel
艇長: (ていちょう) - skipper (of a boat); coxwain
艤装: (ぎそう) - fitting-out of a ship; rigging; ship's outfit
艦名: (かんめい) - name of a warship; warship name
艦橋: (かんきょう) - bridge (e.g. on a warship)
艦載: (かんさい) - carried aboard a warship
艪杭: (ろぐい) - fulcrum peg (fitted into the cavity in an oar as part of a traditional oarlock)
艪臍: (ろべそ) - fulcrum peg (fitted into the cavity in an oar as part of a traditional oarlock)
艫綱: (ともづな) - stern line; mooring line
艮: (こん) - Northeast (Zodíaco oriental) , gen (one of the trigrams of the I Ching: mountain, northeast)
艮下艮上: (ごんかごんしょう) - one of the 64 trigrams
良: (você/eu) - good , good; B grade (in an A, B, C ... system)
良い: (yoi) - good, excellent, fine, nice, pleasant, agreeable; sufficient, enough, ready, prepared , good, excellent, fine, nice, pleasant, agreeable; sufficient, enough, ready, prepared; profitable (acordo, proposta de negócio, etc.), beneficial; OK, all right, fine, no problem
良いお年を: (よいおとしを) - Have a good New Year
良いお年をお迎え下さい: (よいおとしをおむかえください) - Have a good New Year
良いかんじ: (よいかんじ) - pleasant feeling; good vibes
良いこと: (よいこと) - good thing/nice thing; (usu. as 〜を良いことに(して))  good excuse/good grounds/good opportunity; interjection used to impress an idea or to urge a response
良いころ: (よいころ) - high time; about time
良いせん: (よいせん) - more or less right; you are on the right track; getting warm
良いとこどり: (よいとこどり) - focusing on only the good points or strong points; incorporating the benefits (while ignoring the drawbacks); picking the best of both (everything); cherry-picking (e.g. information)
良いとこ取り: (よいとこどり) - focusing on only the good points or strong points; incorporating the benefits (while ignoring the drawbacks); picking the best of both (everything); cherry-picking (e.g. information)
